idea:
Amicus is a management consultancy startup where our team is experienced in assisting Companies maximize their Financial and Business opportunities . Amicus works with top management to drive business Growth and Profitability through a bouquet of services including:

- Business Transformation (Growth/ Profit Enhancement)

- CFO and Board Advisory Services

- Transaction Advisory ( Fund Raise )

- Supply Chain Management

- Digital & Corporate Communications


https://www.amicusllp.com/
name: Amicus Insolvency and Turnaround Services LLP

idea:
1stly thank you for showing your interest in investing in our vision, we are a group of professionals in the Hospitality and Alo-Bev industry.

The vision of 1873 Brewing Co. is to open craft beer tap rooms across Mumbai with 2 – 3 Outlet owned by the Brand and then franchise the model with another F&B enthusiast, Once we reach our volumes of Beer consumption, our target is to set up a brewery in Karjat (Maharashtra) this will enable us in building the Value and also with the Volumes with our own franchise and outlet model help us with the working cost of the Brewery.

As of now we are a start-up and had launched our 1st outlet in Vile Parle East, near the Domestic Airport but due to Land load asking for high rent and the situation of the F&B market in Mumbai we had to hand over the place back to the owners.

But with the pilot project we could create some brand Recall with the same, we have multiple places and outlets offered to us by high-end real estate owners and developers in Mumbai.

As I mentioned in my work the aim is to become and Craft Beer company but with all microbreweries in Maharashtra struggling to reach the minimum volumes we can enter the market with White Labelling Model between us and the brewers till we reach our volumes and then start with our brewery.

Attached is the out business model break – up of 5 years investment and working we are looking for from each outlet.

Do connect with me if there is any clarification needed on the same.
name: 1873 Brewing Co

idea: BIZZFINITY TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED is implemented with an aspiration to achieve pre-eminence in the Information technology development space that provides plethora of services under the IT domain. We aim to deliver innovative solutions that are committed to laying an unconventional foundation for your technological venture while providing end-to-end solutions to your IT requirements. Our robust technological independence, sustainability, familiarity with new trends and market-driven strategic thinking positions us to deliver maximum value to our customers. We’re a team of highly driven individuals with an eye for details, we like to innovate, create and explore with the inexorable pursuit of being the best in the space. With services that include everything starting from , roadmap charting for your venture, need analysis, gap analysis, market analysis, predictive analysis, ruling out all the operational challenges for further development of your idea UI & UX to app development, virtualization and making prototypes, your glass of Information Technology solutions will be full with us. We thrive to harness the power of technological change by providing end-to-end IT solutions right from the scratch, all we need is an idea.
name: BIZZFINITY TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
EurAsia Carbon is a team of highly experienced professionals with in-depth and diverse knowledge of industrial manufacturing processes and capabilities to assist their clients in achieving their carbon neutrality goals.

We help institutions and commercial entities offset their carbon emissions to achieve carbon neutrality. The projects we undertake involve consulting for identification of low-carbon projects, reduction of emissions, carbon credit generation, validation, issuance, and trading of carbon credits with the ultimate goal to drive investment into cleaner and greener options. We also offer carbon credits generated from different direct originations heavily invested into renewable energy, bio-fuels, nature-based solutions, fuel-switch, and other sources; which can be customized to suit organizational emission reduction needs. We also assist companies to get directly involved and partner in developing projects specifically in the Nature Based Solutions space like afforestation & reforestation, agroforestry, carbon farming etc. We have a vast network and access to many carbon credit generators and off-setters which gives us the necessary edge in this complex marketplace.
name: EURASIA CARBON LLP

idea: VRDDHI DETTA PRIVATE LIMITED offer huge variety of products from menstrual cups, tampons, panty liners, and intimate cleansers with major preference given to menstrual cups wherein Consumers can access best in quality totally chemical free products at a very attractive price band and also helps other Woman’s in maintaining a proper hygiene during their menstruation cycle.
name: VRDDHI DETTA PRIVATE LIMITED
